module.name: Ft.Xml.XInclude
module.description:
XInclude processing is normally controlled via the Domlette reader APIs and is implemented within Domlette itself. This module just provides constants and classes to support XInclude processing.
XInclude is defined at http://www.w3.org/TR/xinclude
